title: Pass without Trace
content:
Pass without Trace Level 2 Abjuration Spell Call forth a veil of shadows and silence that gives you and all nearby companions a +10 bonus to Stealth Checks. Until Long Rest Concentration Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Call forth a veil of shadows and silence that gives you and all nearby companions a +10 bonus to Stealth Checks.
